data.name: Our video game store
data.description:
In this exercise we will see how to create a video game store.

Firstly we will create a class DataGame with two attributes: price and stock(being the numbers of copies of that game. Currently in this exercise you will not need the stock attribute). Your collection should look like this: "doom", (59.99, 5)
           "call of duty", (42.99, 10)
           "halo", (10.00, 20)
           "lara croft", (4.99, 2)
           "star wars", (16.00, 50)
           

Secondly we need to create a collection which contains the name of the game as a key and the object itself.

And thirdly the porpuse of your kata is to when a client has enough budget to buy the games he desires.
